content.en: Reservoir optimization: Algorithms are being used to improve the operation of reservoirs in real-time, optimize large-scale reservoir operations, minimize the variance of benefits from reservoir operation, model uncertainties in short-term reservoir operation, improve the optimal operation of reservoir systems, improve reservoir operation, achieve optimal reservoir operation, determine effective decision-tree algorithms for reservoir operations, develop reservoir operation policies considering variable agricultural water demands, improve the determination of optimal operating policies for reservoir outlets, achieve eco-friendly reservoir operation considering water quality objectives, characterize reservoirs, make reservoir operating rules robust to inflow nonstationarity, and accurately estimate reservoir oil formation volume factor.
content.da: Reservoiroptimering: Algoritmer bruges til at forbedre driften af reservoirer i realtid, optimere store reservoiroperationer, minimere variansen af fordele ved reservoirdrift, modellere usikkerheder i kortvarig reservoirdrift, forbedre den optimale drift af reservoirsystmer, forbedre reservoirdrift, opnå optimal reservoirdrift, bestemme effektive beslutningstræ-algoritmer for reservoiroperationer, udvikle reservoirdriftspolitikker med hensyntagen til variabelt landbrugsvandbehov, forbedre bestemmelsen af optimale driftsstrategier for reservoirudløb, opnå miljøvenlig reservoirdrift i betragtning af vandkvalitetsmål, karakterisere reservoirer, gøre regler for reservoirdrift robuste over for inflow-ikke-stationaritet og nøjagtigt estimere reservoir oliemængdefaktor.
